My Robot Home Plus SKU: 38981097
My Robot Home Compact SKU: 38981097

# My Robot Home Plus/Compact

Automatic Mechanical door, Solar light, Roof opening and Hight quality Danish design.

You do not have to program a timer – the garage door is mechanical and works without electricity. The light runs on solar energy.

2025 news: Fewer parts, faster installation.

## FEATURES:

- Auto-mechanical door that opens and closes automatically
- Access the robot from the top
- Solar illumination
- Adjustable feet and asphalt roof

- Fits 90% of all robot mowers
- Colour: grey / white
- Protects the robot all year round

My Robot Home Plus
My Robot Home Compact

Door size: 70cm x 40cm Length: 107cm
Door size: 55cm x 33cm Length: 81,4cm
# Wooden garages

All our wooden garages work for RTK robots, are made of fast growing wood, and have a 2-year warranty. At AM ROBOTS we recommend giving the garages a coat of paint or oil every second year, to keep the quality of the garage intact.

Plus - Red SKU: 38983397
Compact - Red SKU: 38943398

# Lifespan of a Robot mower

Without garage With garage

"The ultimate garage for wireless robots".

AM ROBOTS presents the new Navi Home
The Garage especially designed for RTK-Robots.

# Navi Home - RTK

Specialized shelter designed to optimize the signal reception for RTK robots.
Compatible with various satellite navigations.

Originally designed for the Segway Navimow robot but works for all wireless robots.
The shelter's roof can be tilted so you can gain easy access to the robot.

## FEATURES:

- RTK Compatibility
- Simple Installation
- Roof with UV-Protection
- Included Storm Anchors

Navi Home

Size: 77cm x 72cm x 48cm

# AM Hybrid Grass

AM Hybrid grass gives natural grass the opportunity to recover and grow through the net.

AM Hybrid grass provides a natural look while hiding bald patches in the garden. Use it on steep areas in the garden where the robot tends to slide down. Ideal for the docking station where the grass is worn away by the robot - perfect for places where the grass does not grow.

The Hybrid grass makes sure you do not have to worry about the robot getting stuck anywhere on the lawn, allowing the robot to cut the entire lawn all year round.

| Hybrid Grass | Size: 80cm x 80cm |
| --- | --- |
| Hybrid Grass | Size: 2m x 2m |
| Hybrid Grass | Size: 20m x 1m |

# FEATURES:

- Protects the lawn
- Invisible in 3-4 weeks
- Gives the robot a better grip
- Use it by the docking station
- Made of: Synthetic grass

The natural grass grows through the Hybrid Grass with the roots well protected underneath the net.
 Ø 3,8mm

Metal protection

High signal strength

# Our Cable selection

## PREMIUM SAFETY CABLE 3,8MM

The premium cable with 3-layer protection includes Rodent Repellent in the outer layer and has a strong metal mesh. The best cable for professional installers who prefer to use time on installations instead of repairs.

Inner core: 1,5mm²

Cable size: 3,8mm

## STANDARD CABLE 3,4MM

The 3,4mm cable is suitable for all cable machines.

A great, flexible standard cable for professional installers.

For all robot mower installations.

Inner core: 1,5mm²

Cable size: 3,4mm

## BASIC CABLE 2,7MM

The 2,7mm cable is ideal for installations above ground.

A good basic cable for all robot mower installations.

Inner core: 1,5mm²

Cable size: 2,7mm

Video - Click to watch

First Boundary wire with 10 years warranty!
3-layer safety cable with metal protection and infused repellent.

- Rodent repellent + 3-layer protection
- Upgrated with a 300% stronger mesh
- 10-year warranty

# Terra 800 Cable Machine

Cost-Efficient cable machine with the drill bit system, fitting all AM ROBOTS cable spools.

- Loncin four-stroke push mower engine. Max 
- Noise specifications: 72 dB/a
- Efficient: UP to 600m/h
- Depth from 1-5cm underground
- 180 degrees handle tilting
- Takes cable up to 6mm in Diameter
- Meter-counter included

Fuel-driven cable machine

SKU: 90973596

AM
SKU:90979796

# PWM 600MH Cable Machine

Designed by professionals to optimize the work of robotic mower installers.

- Powerful 4-stroke Honda GXH50 Engine, 2,1 HP
- Installs 600 meters per hour
- Wire depth 4-6 cm underground
- Ergonomic handle
- Cable size up to 6 mm
- Heavy-duty blades for all underground obstacles

Fuel-driven cable machine

SKU:90978896

# PWM 600MH-LI Cable Machine

The best battery-driven cable machine for robot mower installations.

- Brushless 80/82V Lithium-Ion battery electric motor
- Silent and sustainable installation
- Emission-free operation
- Ergonomic handle
- Can take up to 70% steep slopes
- Heavy duty blades for all underground obstacles

# Robot ReDirect

Exclude or include areas with a simple twis.

- Use 1 unit per area
- IP67 waterproof and frost resistant (-18 °C), so it can stay outside year after year.
- Screw it into the ground, and simply twist it to activate.
- Tested on Husqvarna, Ambrogio, STIHL, Robomow, Worx, Cup Cadet, AL-KO and other model robot mowers
- Include or exclude an area with a twist

Choose where to cut

M
# Blades

At AM ROBOTS we develop our blades with the highest concern for safety.

The blades are made of stainless steel, with an extra hard coating, designed to minimize the chance of breakage if the blade hits a rock or hard branch during cutting.

Stainless steel's strength, resistance to corrosion and low maintenance makes it the ideal material for our blades. Furthermore, we appreciate its long lifespan and that the material is 100% recyclable.

- Developed with a high concern for safety
- Stainless steel
- 100% recyclable

 ROBOTS

# Tools

The main principles of robot lawnmower installations are the same no matter the garden. But the tools used for the installation, or repair, vary.

At AM ROBOTS we continuously try to evolve and meet the demands, by revolutionizing our product range. Supplying worldwide installers the best tools in the industry.

- Pliers
- Trackers
- Cleaning tools
- Heat Gun
- Tools for every installation

SKU:60503581

# AM Wirestripper 5in1

The multi-function feature means that you only need one tool.

- Stripping
- Crimping
- Cutting
- Adjustable to fit any type and size of cable

AM Wirestripper 5in1

1 pc

SKU:60509397

# AM Pro Tracker Plus

AM Pro Tracker Plus can locate wire breaks down to a depth of 2 meters. Can be used on partial breaks.

- Customized display that improves useability
- Multiple track options
- USB Rechargeable
- The detected cable length can be up to 2 km
- Earth-Rod included

AM Pro Tracker Plus

1 pc

SKU:60503597

# Basic Tracker

The Basic Cable Tracker works for cables above ground.

- Capable of tracing cable breaks, such as single-core, 2-core, or multi-core cable
- The detected cable length can be up to 10 km

Basic Tracker

1 pc
 # MAX Jet Cleaning tool

Helps removing the grass and dirt buildup under the mower quickly.

- POWER 7,2V 160W
- 4.0 AH Battery built in 21700 cell
- 2 Nozzles stepless speed
- MAX air flow: 30 min
- MAX air velocity: 24 m/s
- Configuration: Type C charging port

Air blower

SKU: 62691699

# AM Portable Heat Gun

AM ROBOTS presents the best tool for any repair or installation of robot lawnmower cable.

This product has been designed to make repairs on boundary cable in any garden at any location. It is possible to do 30 repairs on one battery charge.

The heat gun runs on 18-volt power and the 4AH battery will provide you with a powerful heat blow. The max temperature is 550°C which gives the perfect heat needed for all heat shrink connectors.

## FEATURES:

- Cordless with lithium battery
- Repair over 30 boundary wires on one charge
- Used for heat shrink connectors
- Works for all robot mower cables
- Cooling system

- Battery: 4AH lithium battery
- Power: 18v DC
- Rated current: 15A
- Max temp: 550 °C
- Max airflow: 200L/min

Perfect for any repair or installation

Video - How to use the Heat Gun with the connectors from AM Robots

AM
 # Connectors

At AM ROBOTS we develop our connectors with two subjects in focus. First of we need them to function with a strong connection and long lifespan.

Second, we are aiming to facilitate quick and easy solutions for our dedicated installers all over the world.

With our big assortment we have connectors that fit every need when doing an installation or repair of a robot mower.

- Strong connections
- Quick and easy solutions
- Used for Installations and repairs
SKU:53989924

# Scotchlok 314 Connector

The most used connector for underground installations.

- Provides an insulated connection for 2 to 3 wires
- Use this product with a mineral oil lubricant to create a tight seal that is resistant to moisture
- The insulated connector is designed to work with 22 to 14 AWG solid/stranded wires
- Corrosion resistance is provided by the tin plating that is constructed from high-quality brass for good conductivity
- Suitable for use at temperatures up to 105°C (221°F)

Scotchlok 314 Connector 5 pcs | 100 pcs
 pcs SKU: 52530698
100 pcs SKU: 51690698

# Pro Guide Cable Connector

Avoid cutting the boundary cable by using a pro guide cable connector.

- 100% waterproof
- Resistant to heat and cold with a polypropylene insulation
- Used to tap into a wire circuit without cutting or stripping the wire

 # AM ROBOTS

AM ROBOTS is an international manufacturer and distribution company based in Denmark.

We design, produce, and sell innovative solutions for all aspects of the robotic lawnmower industry and are present throughout Europe and other parts of the world. Our range is vast, and we establish our set of values on quality, credibility, and service.

AM ROBOTS consists of a competent, curious, and innovative workforce that thrives in a changing industry alongside constant technological development. Our core product line is cable, and we are proud to present it along with the rest of our products in this catalogue.
